question: Why would a person acquire culture non-deliberately as opposed to deliberately?

answers.text: They live in the United States and their employer has sent them to China to complete a work project.
They made a friend who was raised in a different culture and they want to learn to appreciate their friendâ€™s foods and music.
Parents season food in a certain way, and their child sees these tastes as natural and assumes that everyone in the world likes the same flavors.
They are required to take a language class in high school.
